# Working example with sea lion genome

## Genome Track
```{r}
options(ucscChromosomeNames = FALSE)
getOption("Gviz.scheme")
data(collapseTrack)

plot_start <- 1
plot_end <- 3986568

gen <- readDNAStringSet("/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/assembly/Y.fa")
chr <- "CM019820.2"
```

## Genome Axis Track
```{r}
genometrack <- GenomeAxisTrack()
```

## SNP Track (MassArray)
```{r}
snp_file <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/haplotype_analysis/MassArraySNPpositions.txt"
snp_data <- read.csv(snp_file, sep = "\t")
snpTrackMassArray <- AnnotationTrack(
  start = snp_data$Position, end = snp_data$Position,
  chromosome = chr, genome = gen,
  id = snp_data$Assay, feature = snp_data$Assay,
  name = "MassArray SNPs",
  stacking = "dense",
  col="lightgrey", fill="lightgrey"
)
```

## SNP Track (Bioinf)
```{r}
snp_file <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/Y_annotation_plot/All_males_CSL_Y_snp.bed"
```

## Genes Track
```{r}
Yregion_col <- c(
  "pseudo" = "mediumseagreen",
  "single" = "steelblue3",
  "multi" = "#fdf065",
  "Xtrans" = "palevioletred2"
)

annotation_file <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/Y_annotation_plot/Ychromsome_annotation_Rin.csv"
anno <- read.csv.sql(annotation_file, sep = '\t', sql="select * from file where gene_biotype != 'pseudogene'")
geneTrack <- AnnotationTrack(
            genome = "ZalCal", name = "Genes", chromosome = chr,
            start = anno$Start, end = anno$Stop, strand = anno$Strand,
            feature = anno$Name,
            fill = Yregion_col[anno$Yregion],
            col = "white",
            stacking="hide", shape="fixedArrow", arrowHeadWidth=100)
```

```{r}
  "DNA/hAT-Blackjack" = "steelblue3",

  "DNA/PIF-Harbinger" = "steelblue3",
  "DNA/TcMar-Mariner" = "steelblue3",
  "DNA/TcMar-Tc2" = "steelblue3",
  "DNA/TcMar-Tigger" = "steelblue3",
  "LINE/CR1" = "mediumseagreen",
  "LINE/L1" = "mediumseagreen",
  "LINE/L2" = "mediumseagreen",
  "LINE/Penelope" = "mediumseagreen",
  "LINE/RTE-BovB" = "mediumseagreen",
  "LTR?" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/ERV1" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/ERVL" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/ERVL?" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/ERVL-MaLR" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/Gypsy" = "#fdf065",
  "LTR/Gypsy?" = "#fdf065",
  "SINE/5S-Deu-L2" = "palevioletred2",
  "SINE/MIR" = "palevioletred2",
  "SINE/tRNA" = "palevioletred2",
  "SINE/tRNA-Deu" = "palevioletred2",
  "SINE/tRNA-RTE" = "palevioletred2",
  "rRNA" = "orange",
  "snRNA" = "orange",
  "tRNA" = "orange",
  "Satellite" = "#c02727",
  "Simple_repeat" = "lightgrey",
  "Low_complexity" = "lightgrey"
)
repeats_file <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/Y_annotation_plot/GCA_009762305.2_mZalCal1.pri.v2_rm.CM019820.2.csv"
repeats <- read.csv(repeats_file, sep = '\t')
repeats <- repeats %>% filter(!repeat_class %in% c("LINE/CR1","LINE/L1","LINE/L2","LINE/Penelope" ,"LINE/RTE-BovB"))
repeatsTrack <- AnnotationTrack(
            genome = "ZalCal", name = "Repeats", chromosome = chr,
            start = repeats$pos_in_query_begin, end = repeats$pos_in_query_end,
            feature = repeats$ID,
            fill = repeat_class_col[repeats$repeat_class],
            col = repeat_class_col[repeats$repeat_class],
            stacking="dense")
```

## Homologous Track
```{r}
homolog_file <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/blast/homologous_regions.rX_wo_PAR_cumsum.qY.filtered1000.90pident.sorted.merged.bed"
homolog <- read.csv(homolog_file, sep = '\t')
homologTrack <- AnnotationTrack(
                genome = "ZalCal", name = "Homologs", chromosome = chr,
                start = homolog$Start, end = homolog$End,
                stacking="dense",
                col="#2180ce", fill="#2180ce")
```

## Coverage Track
```{r}
bam <- "/home/yakupova/1PROJECTS/Y/bam/G465_merged_duprm_subsample0_25_realigned.Y.bam"
coverageTrack <- DataTrack(range = bam, genome = "ZalCal", type = "l",
                           name = "Coverage", window = -1,
                           chromosome = chr, ylim = c(0, 20))
```

## Plot Tracks
```{r}
plotTracks(list(
              genometrack,
              geneTrack,
              snpTrackMassArray,
              snpTrackBioinf,
              repeatsTrack,
              homologTrack,
              coverageTrack
            ),
           from = plot_start, to = plot_end,
           chromosome = chr,
           legend = TRUE, groupAnnotation = "feature",
           rotation.group = 90, just.group = "above",
           background.panel = "white", background.title = "white",
           col.axis = "black", col.title = "black")
```
